title: [Bug]: Unable to display tray icon in Xbuntu 24.04
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

Unable to display tray icon in Xbuntu 24.04

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.14

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Tray icon cannot be show.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown

```
